data.title: Top 23 Global Foreign Exchange Service Companies
data.meta_description: Explore the top 23 foreign exchange service companies reshaping global commerce and investment. This includes specialist platforms like FXCM and comprehensive service providers like UAE Exchange India
data.text:
The foreign exchange service industry covers a broad range of companies, from large financial institutions to specialized startups. These companies offer services linked to currencies and their exchange - be it for travel, business, or investment purposes. They enable the conversion and transfer of money across borders, facilitating global commerce. The forex trading subset of this industry offers a platform for investors to take part in the world's largest financial market. The industry has seen an increase in online platforms and technologies that have democratized access to these services. In the future, it is expected that digitalization, decentralized finance, and blockchain may create new possibilities within the foreign exchange service industry.

Top 23 Foreign Exchange Service Companies

1. Fxcm

Website: fxcm.com

Headquarters: London, London, United States

Founded: 1999

Headcount: 501-1000

Latest funding type: Ipo

LinkedIn

FXCM is a global broker offering Forex trading services to retail investors. With offices in different countries and regulated by various authorities, they provide access to a large, liquid market with potential for gains.

2. UAE Exchange India

Founded: 1999

Headcount: 5001-10000

LinkedIn

They offer services such as currency exchange, money transfer, travel cards, and insurance solutions. With a focus on customer satisfaction, UAE Exchange India aims to provide reliable and convenient financial solutions.

Our competitive rates on foreign currencies and fast worldwide payment options make us a trusted choice for customers. They provide currency exchange services, including currency notes and forex cards, and also facilitate international wire transfers. With a wide range of currencies available and partnerships with reputed banks, they ensure fast and reliable money transfers. BookMyForex is authorized and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India.

The company provides first-class support from real people and ensures the safeguarding of funds through bank-beating FX services. Rated Excellent on Trustpilot, CurrencyFair offers a hassle-free experience with easy-to-use features and bank-level security.
